page.title: 09TALKING TO PEOPLE
page.content: People seem to be very happy living in Sedbergh on the whole and they are content with the limited facilities available. They either make do with what is here or go to Kendal where there is a much larger choice of activities. We talked to one lady who said that Sedbergh is standing still and there is no future for the young people here unless they go into farming. Many people did not like the large number of tourists who visit Sedbergh in the summer, mainly because of the closure of useful shops to be replaced by gift shops and other tourist amenities. Several people were afraid that there were plans to develope a trunk road through the town.
